verses.text: Aton eb' winh yuninal winhaj Israel tik: Vinhaj Rubén, winhaj Simeón, winhaj Leví, winhaj Judá, winhaj Isacar, winhaj Zabulón,
winhaj Dan, winhaj José, winhaj Benjamín, winhaj Neftalí, winhaj Gad yet' winhaj Aser.

Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Judá: Aton winhaj Er, winhaj Onán yet' winhaj Sela. Ha snun eb' winh oxvanh tik, aton ix yisil winhaj Súa aj Canaán. Ha winhaj Er chi' b'ab'el yuninal winhaj Judá, te chuk sb'eyb'al winh, yuj chi' ix satjiel winh yuj Jehová.
Axo ix Tamar, ix yalib' winhaj Judá chi', ay chavanh yune' ix yet' winh: Aton winhaj Fares yet' winhaj Zera. Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Judá chi' ovanh eb' winh t'a smasanil.
Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Fares chi': Aton winhaj Hezrón yet' winhaj Hamul.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Zera chi': Aton winhaj Zimri, winhaj Etán, winhaj Hemán, winhaj Calcol yet' winhaj Dara. Ovanh eb' t'a smasanil.
Axo winhaj Carmi smam winhaj Acán. Ha winhaj Acán chi' ix ik'ancot yaelal t'a yib'anh chonhab' Israel, yujto ix yik'cot juntzanh tas winh t'a skal tas ix yal Dios to satjiel t'a junelnhej.
Axo yuninal winhaj Etán, aton winhaj Azarías.
Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Hezrón: Aton winhaj Jerameel, winhaj Ram yet' winhaj Quelubai.
Ha winhaj Ram chi' smam winhaj Aminadab. Axo winhaj Aminadab chi' smam winhaj Naasón. Ha winhaj Naasón yajal ix aj winh t'a skal eb' yinhtilal Judá.
Ha winhaj Naasón chi' smam winhaj Salmón. Ha winhaj Salmón chi' smam winhaj Booz.
Ha winhaj Booz chi' smam winhaj Obed, aton winh smam winhaj Isaí.
Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Isaí chi', aton eb' winh tik: B'ab'el winhaj Eliab, schab'il winhaj Abinadab, yoxil winhaj Simea,
schanhil winhaj Natanael, yoil winhaj Radai,
svaquil winhaj Ozem, yuquil winhaj David.
Eb' ix yanab' eb' winh tik: Aton ix Sarvia yet' ix Abigail. Axo eb' winh yune' ix Sarvia chi', oxvanh eb' winh: Aton winhaj Abisai, winhaj Joab, winhaj Asael.
Axo winh yune' ix Abigail chi', aton winhaj Amasa. Ha winh smam winhaj Amasa chi', aton winhaj Jeter ismaelita.
Axo winhaj Caleb yuninal winhaj Hezrón, ay jun yuninal winh scuch Jeriot, yune' ix Azuba. Axo juntzanhxo eb' winh yune' ix: Aton winhaj Jeser, winhaj Sobab yet' winhaj Ardón.
Axo ix cham ix Azuba chi', haxo ix Efrata ix yik' winhaj Caleb chi'. Ay jun yune' ix, aton winhaj Hur.
Ha winhaj Hur chi' smam winhaj Uri. Axo winhaj Uri chi' smam winhaj Bezaleel.
Ayic 60 ab'ilxo sk'inal winhaj Hezrón, ix yik' ix yisil winhaj Maquir winh, aton winh smam winhaj Galaad. Ix alji jun yune' ix yet' winhaj Hezrón chi', aton winhaj Segub.
Ha winhaj Segub chi' smam winhaj Jair. Ha winhaj Jair chi' ayoch yajalil t'a 23 chonhab' t'a yol smacb'en Galaad.

Axo pax eb' aj Gesur yet' eb' aj Aram ix ik'ancan juntzanh schonhab' winhaj Jair chi' yet' chonhab' Kenat yet' yaldeail, 60 chonhab'il t'a smasanil. Masanil juntzanh eb' tik, yinhtilal eb' winhaj Maquir.
Ayic toxo ix cham winhaj Hezrón chi', haxo winhaj Caleb ix ik'ancan ix yetb'eyum winh, aton ix Efrata. Ix alji jun yune' ix, aton winhaj Asur smam yicham eb' aj Tecoa.
Aton sb'i eb' winh yuninal winhaj Jerameel tik, winh sb'ab'el unin winhaj Hezrón: Vinhaj Ram winh b'ab'el unin, winhaj Buna, winhaj Orén, winhaj Ozem yet' winhaj Ahías.
Ha winhaj Jerameel chi', ay junxo ix yetb'eyum winh, aton ix Atara snun winhaj Onam.
Aton sb'i eb' winh yuninal winhaj Ram tik, winh sb'ab'el unin winhaj Jerameel: Vinhaj Maaz, winhaj Jamín yet' winhaj Equer.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Onam chi': Aton winhaj Samai yet' winhaj Jada. Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Samai chi': Aton winhaj Nadab yet' winhaj Abisur.
Ha ix yetb'eyum winhaj Abisur chi', aton ix Abihail. Ha ix chi' snun winhaj Ahbán yet' winhaj Molid.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Nadab chi': Aton winhaj Seled yet' winhaj Apaim. Ha winhaj Seled chi' malaj yuninal winh.
Axo winhaj Apaim chi' smam winhaj Isi. Axo winhaj Isi chi' smam winhaj Sesán. Axo winhaj Sesán chi' smam winhaj Ahlai.
Axo winhaj Jada yuk'tac winhaj Samai, a winh smam winhaj Jeter yet' winhaj Jonatán. Ha winhaj Jeter chi' malaj yuninal winh.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Jonatán chi': Aton winhaj Pelet yet' winhaj Zaza. Ha eb' winh tik, yinhtilal eb' winh winhaj Jerameel.
Ha winhaj Sesán, malaj yuninal winh, yuj chi' a junok eb' ix yisil winh ix yik'laj sb'a yet' jun winh schecab' winh scuch Jarha aj Egipto. Ix alji jun yune' ix scuch Atai.

Aton eb' winh tik yinhtilal winhaj Atai t'a stzolal: Vinhaj Natán, winhaj Zabad, winhaj Eflal, winhaj Obed, winhaj Jehú, winhaj Azarías, winhaj Heles, winhaj Elasa, winhaj Sismai, winhaj Salum, winhaj Jecamías yet' winhaj Elisama.
Ha winhaj Caleb yuk'tac winhaj Jerameel chi', a winh smam winhaj Mesa b'ab'el yuninal, winhaj Zif yet' winhaj Maresa smam winhaj Hebrón.
Axo winhaj Hebrón chi' smam winhaj Coré, winhaj Tapúa, winhaj Requem yet' winhaj Sema.
Aton eb' winh tik yinhtilal winhaj Sema t'a stzolal: Vinhaj Raham, winhaj Jorcoam, winhaj Requem, winhaj Samai, winhaj Maón yet' winhaj Bet-sur.
Ha ix Efa schab'il yetb'eyum winhaj Caleb, aton ix ay yune' winhaj Harán, winhaj Mosa yet' winhaj Gazez. Axo winhaj Harán chi' smam junxo winhaj Gazez.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Jahdai: Aton winhaj Regem, winhaj Jotam, winhaj Gesam, winhaj Pelet, winhaj Efa yet' winhaj Saaf.

Axo ix Maaca schab'il pax yetb'eyum winhaj Caleb chi', a ix ay yune' winhaj Seber yet' winhaj Tirhana. Anheja' ix ay yune' winhaj Saaf smam winhaj Madmana. Anheja' ix ay yune' winhaj Seva smam winhaj Macbena yet' winhaj Gibea. Axo ix yisil winhaj Caleb chi', aton ix Acsa.
Ha juntzanh eb' winh tik yinhtilal eb' winhaj Caleb chi'. Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Hur, winh sb'ab'el une' ix Efrata, aton winhaj Sobal, winh smam yicham eb' aj Quiriat-jearim,
winhaj Salma, smam yicham eb' aj Belén yet' winhaj Haref smam yicham eb' aj Bet-gader.
Axo eb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Sobal smam yicham eb' aj Quiriat-jearim: Aton winhaj Haroe, nanhal eb' manahetita,
yet' junjun makan eb' aj Quiriat-jearim: Aton eb' itrita, eb' futita, eb' sumatita yet' eb' misraita. Aton t'a eb' chi' ix cot eb' zoratita yet' eb' estaolita.
Axo winhaj Salma ix cajnajcan t'a chonhab' Belén. Ha winh smam yicham eb' netofatita, eb' aj Atrot-bet-joab yet' nanhalxo eb' manahetita, eb' zoraíta,
yet' eb' yinhtilal eb' soferita ix ek' cajan t'a Jabes, aton eb' tirateo, eb' simateo yet' eb' sucateo. Yed' eb' ceneo cotnac t'a yinhtilal winhaj Hamat smam yicham eb' yinhtilal Recab.
